post.author: 이홍식
post.content:
- http://globefunddb.theglobeandmail.com - www.fundlibrary.com
Mutual Fund쪽으로 관심이 있으시다면 추천하고픈 사이트입니다.
더불어 High/Mid/Low Risk 에서 제가 좋아하는 Funds 몇가지 소개합니다. 더 자세한 정보를 원하시면 email (brian.h.lee@clarica.com) 이나 416-493-9560 ext 2445로 전화주세요.
1. Equity
* CI Harbour http://globefunddb.theglobeandmail.com/gishome/plsql/gis.show_chart?comp_id=2794&fid1=50037&period=060&indx1_id=5073&fid2=0&iaction=Go&pi_universe=PUBLIC_FUND
* CI Canadian Signature Select http://globefunddb.theglobeandmail.com/gishome/plsql/gis.show_chart?comp_id=2794&fid1=50583&period=060&indx1_id=5073&fid2=0&iaction=Go&pi_universe=PUBLIC_FUND
* CI American Manager RSP http://globefunddb.theglobeandmail.com/gishome/plsql/gis.show_chart?comp_id=2794&fid1=53401&period=060&indx1_id=5110&fid2=0&iaction=Go&pi_universe=PUBLIC_FUND
2. Bond
* CI Long Term Bond http://globefunddb.theglobeandmail.com/gishome/plsql/gis.show_chart?comp_id=2794&fid1=18285&period=120&indx1_id=2002&fid2=0&iaction=Go&pi_universe=PUBLIC_FUND
* CI Mid Term Bond http://globefunddb.theglobeandmail.com/gishome/plsql/gis.show_chart?comp_id=2794&fid1=18287&period=120&indx1_id=2002&fid2=0&iaction=Go&pi_universe=PUBLIC_FUND
3. Money Market http://globefunddb.theglobeandmail.com/gishome/plsql/gis.show_chart?comp_id=2794&fid1=18434&period=120&indx1_id=5183&fid2=0&iaction=Go&pi_universe=PUBLIC_FUND
post.title: Investment information site
